'''LINKWI''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] without any given signification.<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 369 (form appearing as "LINKWI-")</ref> It is related to root [[LINI|LIN<sup>1</sup>-]].<ref>{{VT|45a }}, p. 27 (form appearing as "LIÃ‘KWI")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''linqe'' ("wet")<ref name=Ety/>
*[[Noldorin]]: ''lhimp, lhimmid'' ("moisten")<ref name=Ety/>
